<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home">03e03cc247f2b11019a3a22f316d4337</macroponent><name>badge_1/value</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  var opportunities = new GlideAggregate('x_9274_project_p_0_opportunity_calculation');
  opportunities.addQuery('state', 'new');
  opportunities.addAggregate('COUNT');
  opportunities.query();

  var count = 0;
  
  while(opportunities.next()){
    count = opportunities.getAggregate('COUNT')
  }
  
	return count;
  
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-30 10:41:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>42daf8ce47f2b11019a3a22f316d4301</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>badge_1/value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Project Pricing and Offer Tool" source="x_9274_project_p_0">fc77b0294732311019a3a22f316d4341</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Project Pricing and Offer Tool">fc77b0294732311019a3a22f316d4341</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_42daf8ce47f2b11019a3a22f316d4301</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-30 10:42:10</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
